question: How many EU nation signed the landmark PESCO pact to establish closer defence ties recently?
explanation: 25 'Europen Union' nations signed the landmark PESCO pact to establish closer defence ties. The projects is seen as a major step towards establishing the 'Eurpoean Defence Union'. This was followed by the announcement for setting up a 5.5-billion euro European Defence Fund. Currently, the Permanent Structured Cooperation (PESCO) has been signed. Currently, Britain, Denmark, Malta & Ireland are the only EU members who haven't taken up the deal.
